results.definition: in harmony with the spirit of particular persons or occasion
socially or conventionally correct; refined or virtuous

examples: I would kill for a decent cup of coffee

results.definition: in the right manner; correctly; suitably
conforming to conventions of sexual behavior
examples: speech in this circle, if not always decent, never became lewd

results.definition: observing conventional sexual mores in speech or behavior or dress
examples: though one of her shoulder straps had slipped down, she was perfectly decent by current standards

results.definition: sufficiently clothed to see visitors or appear in public
